department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two panel huipil with slit neck opening and randa; white ground cloth with supplementary weft patterning in pink, red, green, blue, orange; multicolored, horizontal, inlay stripe across shoulder; design consists of a wide band of densely brocaded chevron zigags just below shoulders, four narrow bands of simple geometric figures below this panel and two above.
medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
